channel.title: OC on a half fish
channel.description: Recent content in OC on a half fish

item.title: @synthesize, @dynamic
item.description: @synthesize是给属性添加别名，并生成get、set方法（默认使用） @interface ViewController : UIViewController @property (assign, nonatomic) int age; @end @implementation ViewController // 此时在.

item.title: 性能优化
item.description: 在屏幕成像的过程中，CPU和GPU起着至关重要的作用 查看详情 CPU和GPU> CPU和GPU # CPU（Central Processing Unit，中央处理器）

item.title: 探究UIViewController生命周期
item.description: 进入 ViewController2 +[ViewController2 load] // 加载时就会调用 +[ViewController2 initialize] // 第一次接收通知时调用(alloc) -[ViewController2 loadView] -[ViewController2 viewDidLoad] -[ViewController viewWillDisappear:] -[ViewController2 viewWillAppear:] -[ViewController2 viewWillLayoutSubviews] -[ViewController2 viewDidLayoutSubviews] -[ViewController viewDidDisappear:] -[ViewController2 viewDidAppear:] 返回 ViewController
